      • convertLinksToMarkdown

        public static String convertLinksToMarkdown(String val)
        Searches in 'val' anywhere there is a line that begins with http:// (or https), and replaces that with the normal way of doing a link in markdown. So we are injecting a snippet of markdown (not html) todo-1: i noticed this method gets called during the 'saveNode' processing and then is called again when the server refreshes the whole page. This is something that is a slight bit of wasted processing.
